name: Data Map Wales - gov.wales
description: DataMapWales serves as a source for public sector data in Wales, providing a shared data platform to members of the public and public authorities.
data_themes: Society, Economy, Environment, Geographic, Buildings, Topography, Transport, Planning, Resources, Agriculture
